programme.title: Live: MLS Soccer
programme.desc: Charlotte FC host NYCFC for Game 1 of a best-of-three first-round series in the MLS Cup playoffs. The sides swapped 2-0 victories during the regular season. Charlotte comes in hot with two straight wins that helped secure home-pitch advantage.

programme.title: CFL Football
programme.desc: The Tiger-Cats (10-7) go for the East Division title when they host the Redblacks (4-13). Hamilton seeks its first East crown since 2019, and its fifth season sweep of Ottawa in six campaigns after taking both ends of a home-and-home set in July.

programme.title: CFL Football
programme.desc: The Elks (7-10) complete their campaign with a Battle of Alberta clash against the Stampeders (10-7). Edmonton, out of the playoffs for the fifth straight season, has won five of the last six contests against Calgary after splitting two 2025 matches.

programme.title: CFL Football
programme.desc: The Alouettes (10-7) visit the Blue Bombers (9-8) in Manitoba. Winnipeg doubled Montreal 26-13 on the road earlier this year. Brady Oliveira totaled 210 yards from scrimmage and scored for Winnipeg in that win. The Als are 6-2 away from home in 2025.

programme.title: CFL Football
programme.desc: The Roughriders (12-5) and Lions (10-7) tune up for the playoffs in a potential West final preview. West Division champ Saskatchewan has won four straight meetings. A.J. Ouellette (SSK) rushed for 367 yards and three touchdowns during those contests.

programme.title: Live: The Pat McAfee Show
programme.desc: Former NFL punter Pat McAfee brings his humor and candor to the microphone to highlight the day's top stories.

programme.title: Formula 1 Racing
programme.desc: The Formula One title race heats up with the Mexico City Grand Prix. Oscar Piastri's championship lead dwindled to 14 points with another Max Verstappen win in Texas. Piastri's teammate Lando Norris trails, with Verstappen 40 points back in third.

programme.desc: The most outrageous moments in NASCAR history.

programme.desc: FC Cincinnati host Crew SC for Game 1 of a best-of-three first-round series in the MLS Cup playoffs. Cincinnati enters the postseason on a 4-0-1 run with midfielder Evander scoring two of his 18 goals and adding six assists in his last four matches.

programme.title: Live: MLS Soccer
programme.desc: Minnesota United FC try to maintain their grip on Sounders FC in Game 1 of their first-round series in the MLS Cup playoffs. Minnesota won both meetings this season, each by one goal. Seattle enters the postseason with three straight victories.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When the corpse of a famous astronaut is found floating in the waters of Battery Park, Detectives Benson and Stabler think the murder may be connected to a string of serial rapes; at a dead end, Stabler seeks advice from an old mentor (James Brolin).

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Stabler and Benson seek a connection between two men who are beaten and branded with a wire hanger in seemingly separate incidents.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Three young girls' search for a mythical character leads to one of them becoming injured and the other two disappearing.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A teenager found unconscious in the park leads to a missing persons investigation; Benson must help Noah come to terms with the past when he questions the origins of his birth.

programme.title: Everything on the Menu With Braun Strowman
programme.desc: Braun Strowman hits Washington, D.C. hungry, seeking victory-worthy bites across the nation's capital.

programme.title: Everything on the Menu With Braun Strowman
programme.desc: Braun storms Fort Worth for ribs, shareables, and a deep dive into Texas food and heritage.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: After a young girl is kidnapped, Elliot Stabler must work with a recently paroled convict to get her back.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The team searches for a serial killer who justifies his crimes with paranoid religious motivation. Richard Thomas and Karen Allen guest star.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler begin hunting for a serial pedophile after a 5-year-old girl's decomposed body is found in the trash.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives hunt for a suspect with an ax to grind when an engagement party ends in a quadruple homicide.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives investigate when a baby is left abandoned with a note indicating the mother's kidnapping and quickly learn that she has been kidnapped by a copycat serial killer.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The death of a boy and his abusive guardian leads the detectives to a travel agency specializing in exotic trips for sexual predators.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The details of a kidnapping are similar to a series of rapes and murders that may link the crime to a serial killer.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Three people, unconnected except to cases that Detective Benson investigated, are found ritualistically murdered.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives Benson and Stabler look for a killer with a foot fetish.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Family members become murder suspects when DNA tests on the body of a 16-year-old girl reveal evidence of incest.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The death of a wealthy senior citizen leads to an investigations that uncovers a serial killer who targets the elderly.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a teenage girl disappears, a psychic (guest star Martin Short) is brought into the investigation.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Stabler goes under cover as a sex offender to gain the trust of a serial rapist released from jail, but his cover is blown, putting his life in danger.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A serial pedophile murders members of a family and kidnaps the two younger children.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Fin is asked to look into a case of rape at his son's college, where he meets a Brooklyn detective (Adam Beach) who is investigating a similar crime.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a collegian is found dead in her formalwear, detectives recognize the body's mutilation as that of the copycat of a serial killer; a woman goes missing, and comic books are the key to finding her.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A woman's body is found in a park alongside a man with a bullet in his head.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Officer Nate Kendall (Wentworth Miller) helps a woman in trouble and gets roped into investigating a rape; when evidence connects multiple cases, the team realizes there may be a serial rapist responsible.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When the investigation into a missing teen leads the detectives to a severed leg, they are drawn into the world of self-mutilation and ritual amputation.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Amaro suspects the boyfriend of a missing girl is involved with a gang; Sgt. Benson becomes the SVU's new commanding officer.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a teenage sex worker disappears, Rollins and Velasco find a key clue in a pile of neglected missing persons reports.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: To identify a woman's attacker, the SVU must track down a mysterious suspect targeting tourists staying in hostels.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A tourist is found dead with the word "guilty" written on her forehead; Detective Munch is forced to ask his ex-wife (Carol Kane) for help.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Stabler and Benson suspect a sugar daddy (Matt C. Burns) of murder when a young woman's body is found stuffed inside a suitcase.

programme.title: Everything on the Menu With Braun Strowman
programme.desc: Braun Strowman hits Washington, D.C. hungry, seeking victory-worthy bites across the nation's capital.

programme.title: Everything on the Menu With Braun Strowman
programme.desc: Braun storms Fort Worth for ribs, shareables, and a deep dive into Texas food and heritage.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The details of a kidnapping are similar to a series of rapes and murders that may link the crime to a serial killer.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Three people, unconnected except to cases that Detective Benson investigated, are found ritualistically murdered.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: A double homicide in upstate New York leads detectives on a cross-country investigation to piece together a case with a surprising suspect at the center.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: A double homicide in upstate New York leads detectives on a cross-country investigation to piece together a case with a surprising suspect at the center.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: A CIA agent who once worked with Sam seeks his help before dying of an apparent suicide; while working under cover, Deeks and Kensi enter a prized poodle in a dog show.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: A CIA agent's death leads the team to a group of dangerous Russian agents; Hanna worries a secret will be exposed.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: When a 15-year-old hacker compromises missions, Callen goes under cover at a prestigious high school.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a woman goes missing, her boyfriend points Detectives Benson and Stabler in the direction of convicted bank robber Callum Donovan (Stephen Rea); to comprehend the impact of solitary confinement, Stabler experiences it.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Following the deaths of three children, Fin realizes they were all "anchor babies" of immigrant families, and he reaches out to the Center of Immigrant Services.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives Benson and Stabler search for a man who is knowingly spreading HIV.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A lesbian-rights activist (Kathy Griffin) claims a woman's death was the result of police neglect; when more women from the activist's group are attacked, it becomes clear that someone has a plan to bring down the group.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Several young prostitutes are found dead with homemade prayer cards attached to their bodies; Benson is forced to make a difficult decision.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A woman's murder leads Detectives Benson and Stabler to reopen an investigation into a similar crime committed 20 years earlier.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A young girl claims she was raped in the stairwell of her apartment building; Benson and Stabler race to find a witness.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a disabled woman is beaten and raped, Benson and Stabler think someone close to the victim is responsible.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Rollins and Fin investigate an assault in Kentucky that has striking similarities to that of a victim found in Central Park; Benson receives intel that turns the case upside down.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Garland asks Benson to reopen a missing persons case he worked as a rookie officer; a victim in one of Carisi's recent cases is arrested.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When the only evidence in a crime is a church confession, Carisi must find another way to prove his suspect guilty; Benson agrees to meet with an old friend seeking to make amends for past transgressions.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A young boy seeks help when his sister doesn't come home from work; Benson and Carisi suspect a woman's assault was prearranged by a third party.
